messages.content: What is the primary purpose of Low Frequency Oscillators (LFOs) in ComfyUI?
LFOs are used to provide varying inputs to other nodes in ComfyUI.
What is the typical frequency range for an LFO in human hearing?
LFOs typically generate oscillating signals at frequencies below the human hearing range.
In what contexts are LFOs used?
LFOs are used in various fields such as audio synthesis, signal processing, and control systems.
How can I install Comfy-LFO in ComfyUI?
You can install Comfy-LFO from a terminal in the ComfyUI folder using 'cd custom_nodes' and then 'git clone https://github.com/richinsley/Comfy-LFO.git'.
